title: for Skin
body:
Hi . I want to send to my girlfriend skin but the skin that shi love the most is not there the skin is - PAX Sivir - i want to buy it  to my big love.What is gona cots me ???
2000 rp 
5000 rp
10 000rp   is it ok

replies.body:
PAX Sivir was an *Event Limited Skin* that was only attainable at PAX Prime 2011 in Seattle, WA. Unfortunately, there's no way to purchase this skin through the store and all remaining skin code cards that were originally given out have expired by now. Check out our [Legacy Skin Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) for more information on these types of skins.

Let me know if you have any questions.
